channel.title: [Lore Suggestion] The Fool
channel.description:
Lore link: http://tol.wikia.com/wiki/The_Fool
Lore subject: Scout's report
Lore: Wow A section all to the glorius and most handsome guy in town? I'm honorued! I'd like to thank the academy and those stupid bozo's who put me on this page it's really my honor to accept this award IT'S A DREAM COME TRUE! I'm gonna be on broadway mom WAAHOO!
Comments: The Fool troll boxes his own scout report with consistently bad spelling and thinking he's won at the Oscars.
